headline: California American Water Encourages Customers to Follow Safety Tips
summary: PACIFIC GROVE, Calif., December 20, 2024--Safety is of paramount importance to California American Water, for our customers and our employees. California American Water has implemented, and regularly monitors, safety measures ranging from providing safe, clean, and reliable water service, to keeping our workers, customers and the communities we serve safe.

headline: Illinois American Water Proudly Recognizes Partnership with Chicago Urban League
summary: WOODRIDGE, Ill., December 20, 2024--The American Water Charitable Foundation, a 501(c)(3) organization established by American Water, the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., and Illinois American Water, announced today that the Chicago Urban League (CUL) has received a $20,000 commitment as part of a larger Foundation Corporate Strategic grant.
